articles.description: The UK Government is looking at 'non-commercial' flight options to transport the Pfizer coronavirus vaccine from Belgium in the event of a No Deal Brexit, a Foreign Office minister confirmed.
articles.content:
The Armed Forces could be used to airlift further stocks of the Pfizer vaccine from Belgium in the event of a No Deal Brexit, a Foreign Office minister has confirmed.

articles.title: SIMON STEVENS: V-Day is a historic moment… and you can play your part - Daily Mail
articles.description: SIMON STEVENS: This is a landmark day for our country and a momentous day for the NHS as we begin the biggest vaccination campaign in our history.
articles.content:
